1.display: Bits of wood you found around the island. Has many applications even in its unprocessed state.
1.name: Unprocessed Wood

2.display: Superior wood that's been polished and pressure-impregnated for increased durability. Its great number of rings speaks of how old it is.
2.name: Quality Wood

3.display: Lumps of ore you found around the island. They contain gemstones, but they're full of impurities. With some refining, they could shine brilliantly one day.
3.name: Unprocessed Ore

5.display: A yellow gemstone that's been refined. It radiates a cool, gentle light, like the moon. It could fetch a decently good price.
5.name: Shiny Yellow Gemstone

6.display: A red gemstone that's been refined. It radiates a warm, bright light, like the sun. It could fetch a decently good price.
6.name: Shiny Red Gemstone

7.display: A bouquet of handpicked flowers. It has a pleasant, subtle fragrance. Can be given as a gift, or be used to spruce up the place.
7.name: Colorful Bouquet

8.display: The blueprints to some furniture. They list the size and installation method of every part in detail. Every intricate creation begins with a single piece.
8.name: Furniture Blueprints

9.display: A set of stone flooring needed for the hot springs. It's made of natural stone and feels pleasant to walk on.
9.name: Hot Springs Interior Decor

10.display: A device that produces the water needed for the hot springs. The tap is made to look like it's made of bamboo and gives off a strong sense of wabi-sabi.
10.name: Hot Springs Hydrant

11.display: Something for the hot springs-goers to enjoy after their dip. Doughy dangos and cold milk hit different when you feel steaming hot.
11.name: Hot Springs Snacks

12.display: A set of bamboo railings. Well, it's not authentic bamboo, but it looks and smells just like the real deal and adds a unique sense of elegance to the place.
12.name: Hot Springs Exterior Decor

13.display: Everything you need for a visit to the hot springs; a bucket, towel, and a couple of other items to make your stay as pleasant as possible.
13.name: Hot Springs Bathing Set

14.display: An invitation to the anniversary soirée. Give it to a shipgirl to get great rewards!
14.name: Special Invitation

15.display: A commemorative item from the soirée. May the good times last forever.
15.name: Soirée Gift
